description: Creamy burrata and tasty sundried tomatoes, artichokes and olives make a quick and delicious pizza topping.
name: Antipasti & Burrata Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the pizza bases on two baking trays. Drizzle a tablespoon of the sundried tomato oil on the bases.
Arrange the sliced tomatoes, sundried tomatoes, artichokes and olives on the pizza bases and top with chilli flakes. Bake for 10-12 minutes until the bases are golden.
Top each pizza with dollops of burrata, rocket and a drizzle of pesto and serve.
